name: Larry Bigsword's Spacecapade 2023
description:
In Larry Bigsword's Spacecapade, you play as Larry Bigsword, imprisoned on
a ship overtaken by aliens! All you remember is your name is Larry, and
you have a big sword!
Slash and dash your way off of the prison ship riddled with the menacing
Mushrien Fred's army of Nasnols!
Get to the end, defeat Fred, and remember your middle name!
---
Controls:
W/A/S/D - Move
Spacebar - Dash
Left Click - Attack
Right Click - Parry
---
